{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"I am a Software Developer, and Backed Developer I've been working in technology for over six years now, and have gained some experience in all kinds of software development environments. I currently work at Gusto as part of a remote team resolving bugs and easing customer pain. When I'm not working, I like to learn new things by watching documentaries and playing games. 

I am currently learning solidity and smart contract development. 

I am available for contract work. My area of expertise is in building powerful, fast and reliable web applications. I utilize JavaScript, Ruby on Rails or C# to deliver robust back-end services with user-friendly interfaces.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"
